name: Kitten Escape
description:
KittenEscape is a sliding block puzzle game. Everyone from kids to adults can enjoy this classic game.

The rules are very simple: just move blocks up and down, right and left to save the cat.
There are 8 stages. The further you go, the more difficult it becomes. If you complete all the 8 levels, you'll be able to challenge the extra stages. Here you can find 1000 stages.


Features:
- Tap "Undo" button to undo the move.
- Tap "Reset" button to go back to the original position.
- Resume the game when you turn on the application if interrupted.
- Check your moves or processes of the stage you complete.
